attributes.action: Consider fairness for males as well as females during Divorce Proceedings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The law has changed over the years and appears to be biased in most cases towards the female. This is not just evidensed in the United Kingdom but also other countries. Looking at the recent McCartney case we can see a clear lack of fairness. 

In either situations such as with or without children. Men should have equal rights to women. 

Procedures should also be in place in Court so that Judges do not differ when it comes to the ultimate decision made. Most cases are unique but usually there is a common theme with any case that could be proceduralised to prevent ambiguous Court rulings from one Judge to another.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
